name: Coaching for Performance
description: Helps individuals diagnose root causes, take ownership, and commit to measurable next steps. Balances support with firm expectations to improve performance outcomes.
definition: Driving accountability and improvement through structured conversations.
reference_source: Whitmore, J. (2009). Coaching for Performance (GROW).; Center for Creative Leadership / SBI feedback practice.
assessment_dimensions: Goal clarity; Reality diagnosis; Options co-creation; Commitment & follow-through; Accountability tone
scoring_model_logic: SkillPulse: score each dimension (1–5) as the average of mapped Likert/SJT items (reverse-code where applicable); overall skill score = average of dimension scores (or weighted average if weights provided). AI Practice Lab: score each dimension 0–5 using a behavioral rubric (0=not observed, 5=exemplary) with evidence tags; session skill score = weighted average of observed dimensions; track consistency (variance) and improvement vs baseline.
